div.p: The study was funded by the Town Creek Foundation of Easton, Maryland in a grant to the Center for Climate Change Communication at George Mason University. The Maryland Department of Health and Mental Hygiene climate change program is supported by CDC Cooperative Agreements 5UE1EH001049 and 2U38EH000944. The opinions and findings expressed herein do not necessarily represent the views of the Maryland Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, or any other state or Federal agency.
